item.title: Raichur corporation discusses rents for shops in its complex
item.description:
<![CDATA[Raichur Mayor Narasamma Narasimhalu has directed officials to maintain the shopping complex belonging to the City Municipal Corporation properly and fix rents for shops without giving a chance for any complaints about discrepancies.
She was chairing a general body meeting of the City Municipal Corporation at the Zilla Panchayat Auditorium in Raichur on Tuesday.
Ms. Narasimhalu said that rents against shops under the corporation should be proper and as per rules. â€œOfficers should avoid complain...]]>
